result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Marathon County Clerk of Circuit Court

records.addlTxt: Atty Anne Katte
Bail/Bond Forfeiture Hearing on December 5, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Case called: 9:13 a.m.
Clerk: Micki. 

State appears by ADA Hannah Runde.  
Defendant does not appear. 

Date and time set for JPTC.  
State requests warrant due to defendant's non appearance.
COURT notes notice was given for today's hearing.  
COURT authorizes $500.00 bench warrant.  

Date:
BFH - 12/5/22 at 8:30 a.m.

ADJ: 9:14 a.m.
SPD Attorney Status
Signed at MCJ on 10/19/22

Absolute sobriety from and no possession of controlled substances except prescriptions taken as prescribed. No possession of drug paraphernalia. Report to ATTIC Corrections Services (715-848-3202) within one business day of release. Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level 3 supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.

ADDRESS INFO for Shawn A. Malivuk
Current: 400 Thomas Street, Wausau, WI 54403 United States  (Effective: 10-17-2022)
Prior: 227571 Meganser Way, Rib Mountain, WI 54401

Clerk:  Amy. 
Called:  2:27 p.m. 
State appears by ADA Natalie Zibolski.  Defendant appears in custody, via Zoom Video, and with Atty Paige Metzman.   

Date and time set for warrant quash; VRCW.  
**COURT quashes any outstanding warrant**

BOND:  $500.00 signature bond.  

CONDITIONS: 
- Absolute sobriety from and no possession of controlled substances except prescriptions taken as prescribed.  
- No possession of drug paraphernalia. 
- Report to ATTIC Corrections Services within one business day of release.  Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level 3 supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.  

JPTC:  10/28/22 at 9:00 a.m. 

Defendant's address is 400 Thomas Street, Wausau, WI  54403.

Adj:  2:29 p.m. 

Branch 6.
Public Safety Assessment - AMENDED - 10/17/22
$30.00 warrant fee. Brought to jail 10/14/22 by Wausau PD

9:22 AM 
Clerk: Micki

State appears by ADA Hannah Runde; Defendant fails to appear.  

Date and time set for bond forfeiture hearing.

COURT forfeits bond and enters judgment of $250.00 and continues warrant.

Adj: 9:23 a.m.
Bail/Bond Forfeiture Hearing on September 16, 2022 at 08:30 am.

9:56 a.m.
Clerk Micki.

Date and time set for JPTC.  
ADA Boeck requests warrant for defendant's non appearance.
COURT notes notice was given for today's hearing.  
 
COURT authorizes $ 150.00 bench warrant.  

Date:

ADJ: 9:59 a.m.
Judicial Pretrial - in court on August 26, 2022 at 09:50 am.

11:55 AM 
Clerk Micki.

State appears by ADA Hannah Boeck; Defendant appears in person, pro se.

Date and time set for a JPTC.

ADA Boeck makes statement regarding offer drafted.  
COURT addresses Defendant.
Defendant does not wish to be represented by counsel.
COURT questions Defendant regarding waiving right to counsel.
Defendant waives right to counsel. 
COURT finds waiver of rights freely & voluntary made, defendant is competent to represent self.

Signed at MCJ on 07/06/22

ADA Hannah Boeck appears in person; Defendant does not appear - in custody at MCJ
Keep JPTC on as scheduled

No Bars, Taverns, Liquor Stores, or Beer Tents. Absolute sobriety from and no possession of alcohol and controlled substances except prescriptions taken as prescribed. Prints and photograph. Report to ATTIC Correctional Services within one business day of release. Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level 1 supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.

Clerk: Nikki. 
Case Called: 3:06pm.
State appears by ADA Hannah Boeck. Defendant appears via Zoom, in custody, and with Atty Chad Shamali.

Reading Waived. Reserve Jurisdiction.
Court questions defendant re: complaint and rights.
PLEA: NOT GUILTY.

-Prints and photograph.
-Report to ATTIC Correctional Services within one business day of release. Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level 1 supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.
